EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting YETI!
We are sorry to hear about the recent issue with your cooler. To begin your warranty request we do require a few images to confirm and verify the size, color and issue you are experiencing.
• Picture of the cooler with the lid closed and T-Latches in the locked position.
• Picture of either side of the cooler showing the size.
• Picture of the drain area with the drain plug removed.
Please reply back to this email with your pictures. Once we have received these pictures we will be able to identify the issues you are having and further assist you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters YETI 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
